content: > the written instructions for this pattern are available for ** free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains written instructions and chart **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **about the pattern** creating my first graphghan my three little kittens blanket 3 felt like painting with yarn inspired by the technique i wanted to dive deeper and create something new so i decided to make some wall hangings using bobbins to manage the colors i had so much fun watching the designs come to life the possibilities with this technique are endless from simple shapes to detailed patterns whether you stick to a chart or create your own design each project feels unique and personal i hope you have as much fun making this as i did this wall hanging is the first in a three-part series and you can choose to make them individually or as a complete set all the wall hangings in this series are available for purchase as a collection at a 20% discount **skill level** intermediate - this pattern assumes you have basic knowledge of starting and ending a tunisian crochet project executing the tunisian simple stitch and switching colors mid-row **what the pattern contains** 1 written pattern 2 chart 3 video support **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 4 #knitterknotter 5 #madewithknitterknotter 6 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed item 1 https //knitterknotter com/chitra-wall-hanging-1-free-tunisian-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/three-little-kittens-blanket 4 https //www instagram com/knitterknotter/ 5 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/knitterknotter/ 6 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/madewithknitterknotter/
